mapper.sql: title.id_title AS TITL_id_title , title.fk_type AS TITL_fk_type , title.description AS TITL_description , title.date_insert AS TITL_date_insert , title.date_update AS TITL_date_update , title.user_insert AS TITL_user_insert , title.user_update AS TITL_user_update
mapper.select:
SELECT , ref_titletype.code AS TITY_code
FROM title INNER JOIN reference ref_titletype ON ref_titletype.id_reference = title.fk_type WHERE title.id_title = #{idTitle}
mapper.update: UPDATE title SET fk_type = #{fkType}, description = #{description}, user_update = #{userUpdate}, date_update = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE title.id_title = #{idTitle}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO title(fk_type, description, user_insert, date_insert) VALUES (#{fkType}, #{description}, #{userInsert}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
select next from _sequences where name = 'ID_TITLE_SEQ'
